thread.title: Comment on Jason Garrett named coach of the year by rootpain
thread.title_full: Comment on Jason Garrett named coach of the year by rootpain

author: rootpain
title: Comment on Jason Garrett named coach of the year by rootpain
text:
8 Responses to “Jason Garrett named coach of the year” The Truth says: Feb 4, 2017 8:43 PM 
Bet he’d trade that for knowing the illegal substitution rule that crippled the cowboys against green bay along with not knowing the free kick rule he had no clue on at end of first half mrpennypacker says: Feb 4, 2017 8:47 PM 
what about the redskins coach??? and shea is gonna be pissed dispozblcopy says: Feb 4, 2017 8:48 PM 
He is any one of several deserving candidates, including Quinn and BB, so I’m kinda wondering if part of this award isn’t taking into account the adversity he has to overcome with that goofy owner, every day for years, to get the Cowboys to be playoff competitive. patsfan4lifesbchamps says: Feb 4, 2017 8:51 PM 
Hard to argue with Jason Garrett choice although to me Belichick should always be coach of the year. He went 3-1 with nobodies at QB and he is now in the SB. jasons81 says: Feb 4, 2017 8:53 PM 
I suppose they don’t take the playoffs into consideration when handing out this award rootpain says: Feb 4, 2017 8:56 PM 
Well he was probably in the top three. And whenever that happens, any one of them could be selected. So congratulations are in order. Feb 4, 2017 8:58 PM 
very UNdeserving thereisfootballwestofjersey says: Feb 4, 2017 9:01 PM 
How can a coach of the year be the guy who didn’t have his team ready to face the Packers? Leave a Reply 
You must be logged in to leave a comment. Not a member? Register now! Search
